candidate_data.translated_summary: Backend engineer (~5.8 years) in commerce systems. Strong in REST integrations, batch, internal/external sync, data integrity, and operational resilience. Led GitHub Actions/CodeDeploy pipelines and an RDS MySQL 5.7→8.0 upgrade. Recent focus on tests, MSA, and Kafka.

highlights_en: Built ‘Weverse by Fans’ service and integrations
Owned internal production integration and Zendesk integration
Search engine replacement and perf improvements
MongoDB PI processing history module for ISMS

Selected_Projects.name: POD Shop ↔ In-house Mall Product Automation & Admin
Selected_Projects.impact_en: Automated product registration; >60% turnaround reduction; key-based option mapping & validation

Selected_Projects.name: Template/User Project Migration to POD
Selected_Projects.impact_en: Migrated ~13M rows via API while preserving referential integrity; parallelized by queue-id to cut duration ~2 weeks→~3 days

Selected_Projects.name: Zendesk Integration
Selected_Projects.impact_en: Centralized multi-brand inquiries; batch + retry (≤5×), Slack alerts; IP allowlisting and AES-256 identifiers via AOP

Selected_Projects.name: Weverse ByFans
Selected_Projects.impact_en: Multi-module structure; OpenFeign integrations; batch order status sync with retries

ci_cd_presence.details: GitHub Actions + CodeDeploy; zero-downtime EC2 deployments

Problem_Solving: Designed API-based migration preserving referential integrity across tightly coupled schemas.
Customer_Impact: Unified Zendesk integration improved ops efficiency and response times.
Operational_Excellence: Implemented retries (≤5×) with Slack alerts; enforced IP allowlists and encrypted identifiers.
Security_Privacy: Applied AES-256 identifier encryption and allowlisting for integrations.
